name: Step Unseen - Ninja Stealth Game
description:
This was a small game I created for my youtube channel. I made a couple of devlogs that go over how this game was made. This was intended to be a short and simple game so I could learn and finish something.

  • Stay out of guards' sight. If they see you, you have to restart the level!
  • Collect speedup powerups to move faster
  • Throw a shuriken at a guard to kill them

Devlog series here:
